content.html: That must've been some of the most grossly self-centred pieces of writing I've ever read. To think that the Guardian can't bring themselves to publish anything positive by trans people, yet will put shameful cis hand-wringing in their "transgender" section is repugnant.
content.value:
That must've been some of the most grossly self-centred pieces of writing I've ever read.

To think that the Guardian can't bring themselves to publish anything positive by trans people, yet will put shameful cis hand-wringing in their "transgender" section is repugnant.
